name: DecisionCoach
0:
”Alexa, ask Decision Coach if I should go to the gym or watch a movie.”
”I need to make a decision between three options.”
”The second option would be best in the long run.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: decision coach
des:
Decision Coach is designed to help you making a decision between two, three or four options. Like every good coach, it will not tell you which decision it think is best for you, but instead leverage you own wisdom and judgement: Decision Coach asks you about some aspects of your life, and which options scores best in each of those aspects. In the end, it will determine which option scored best, and gives you your result.

You can start Decision Coach by any of these types of phrases:
- "Alexa, launch Decision Coach"
- "Alexa, tell Decision Coach I need to make a decision between three options"
- "Alexa, ask Decision Coach whether I should watch a movie or go to the gym."

If one question doesn't make sense in your context, you can let Decision Coach know and it will move on to the next question:
- "I don't know"
- "This doesn't really matter"
- "Skip question"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
